entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as being pale and no longer looking like Mafalda. She is also mentioned as having gray hair in places.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as wrencheding the stopper off a bottle and pouring potion onto a wound.

relationships.description: Hermione asks Harry for help in unstoppering a bottle, indicating that she needs his assistance.
Harry helps Hermione by unstoppering the bottle and pouring potion onto the wound.
